comment: Can't wait to see what epic roof party setup you've got planned, Justin!
Me trying to casually show up to Justin Bieber's roof party like... This is gonna be legendary!
Wondering what the dress code is for a roof party with Justin Bieber... Jeans and a t-shirt or is it full-on glam?
Droppin' it like it's hot 2005 with this tour lineup! Can't wait to see the West Coast legends all on one stage. #HappyFlowerTour #HighSchoolReunionTour
Is it July yet?! This tour is gonna be epic - Snoop, Wiz, Warren G, Too $hort... all together? Sign me up!
Who remembers cruisin' in their car bumpin' these tracks back in the day? This tour is a trip down memory lane for sure! Any chance of a surprise appearance from Nate Dogg?
Excited for the Mystery Machine Crew! Ruh-roh! Sounds like there's a major mystery brewing, Scoob! Can't wait to see the gang solve it and unmask the culprit. #ScoobyDooBigAdventure
Like, totally tubular adventure time! This reminds me of all the awesome mysteries Scooby and the gang have solved over the years. Feeling nostalgic for some classic Scooby-Doo!
